dcterms:description: The Quantification of Uncertainties in Biomedical Image Quantification Challenge (QUBIQ) is a benchmark dataset specifically for the evaluation of inter-rater variability in medical image segmentation. It includes four different segmentation tasks with CT and MRI modalities, covering brain growth, brain tumor, prostate, and kidney segmentation, each annotated by multiple experts.
dcterms:title: QUBIQ

dcterms:description: Specific tasks within the QUBIQ dataset include brain growth segmentation (MRI), brain tumor segmentation (MRI), prostate segmentation (MRI), and kidney segmentation (CT), each with varying numbers of annotators and cases for training and testing.
dcterms:title: QUBIQ (specific tasks within)
